name: Eskimo Bob: Starring Alfonzo
description: Eskimo Bob is an 8-bit puzzle-platformer with sixty-four levels of fish-collecting action. Originally developed for the NES, you can now enjoy this game on Steam!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz or faster Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 130 MB available space Additional Notes: An old Windows 7 laptop from 10 years ago should run the game without any problems
